knimeNode.name: XML Row Combiner
knimeNode.shortDescription: Concatenates the cells in a XML column.

fullDescription.intro: Concatenates the cells of an XML column. The root elements children of the created XML cell are the root elements of the source cells.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the XML cells.
Name of the new column in the output table.
Name of the created XML element.
Attributes added to the XML element can be defined here.

ports.inPort: Input table containing at least one XML column.
ports.outPort: The output table with one XML cell.
